Class TaggedDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • daos.DAO

  • public class TaggedDAO
extends DAO
    The TaggedDAO class provides access to the thread_tagged table in the database.

      • addTaggedUsers

        public boolean addTaggedUsers(Thread thread,
                              java.util.List<java.lang.String> taggedUsernames)
        Add list of tagged users to a thread
        Parameters:
        thread - thread that contains tags
        taggedUsernames - list of usernames to tag in thread
        Returns:
        true upon successful tagging, false otherwise

      • getTaggedUsernames

        Get username of users who are tagged in specified thread
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        list of usernames of users tagged in specified thread

                                      Thread thread)
        Delete tagged user from specified thread
        Parameters:
        taggedUser - user to untag from thread
        thread - thread to untag user from
        Returns:
        true upon successful untagging, false otherwise
